All Upstate New York Trails

Here, you'll find listings of area trails where you can get outside with a bike or a good pair of hiking shoes. We also share tips for planning excursions and staying safe outside.

Know a trail you'd like to see here? Let us know!

Fox Preserve
Walk to the top of a hill overlooking the Mohawk River in Latham
5 Tips to Get Your Kids Hiking
Advice for helping children to love the outdoors & learn to hike
Roaring Brook Falls
Hike to a beautiful waterfall in the midst of the Adirondack High Peaks Region
Five Rivers Environmental Education Center
Peaceful nature preserve with miles of trails
Three Adirondack Winter Hiking Ideas
If you're looking to get outside to enjoy the beauty of winter, explore these options in the Adirondacks
Mohawk Landing Nature Preserve
Clifton Park trail leading to a peaceful Mohawk River overlook
Upstate New York First Day Hike Ideas
Want to get outside for the New Year? See our list of First Day hikes scheduled for January 1, 2019.
A Few Favorite Local Organizations
Highlighting a few of our favorite area outdoor organizations
Bauer Environmental Park
Nature preserve in the Village of Colonie with a boardwalk meandering through woods and over streams
Ashford Glen Preserve
Suburban nature preserve with steep ravines, towering trees, and a beautiful stream
